name: scar
description: A test runner for Node.js and the browser.
author: Lars Jung <lrsjng@gmail.com> (https://larsjung.de)

scripts.test: npm run -s test:mocha && npm run -s test:scar
scripts.check: npm run -s lint && npm run -s test
scripts.cover:mocha: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --dir coverage/mocha --report text --report html node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot test/tests-mocha.js
scripts.cover:scar: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --dir coverage/scar --report text --report html test/tests-scar.js
scripts.cover: npm run -s cover:mocha && npm run -s cover:scar
scripts.precommit: npm run -s check && npm run -s build
